trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Saginaw
There were no other sightings in Saginaw on or around November 30th 2009
Summary: It was hovering over the city of Saginaw, right on the Zilwaukee Bridge in a triangular shape.
divs: sighting detailswe were driving down i- 75 hway southbond towards the city saginaw, zilwaukee bridge, i was drivng and i look over to my right and noticed this huge craft hovering over the city, i couldnt belive what i saw, ive seen ufos before in my hometown of lewiston, but nothing like this it was traingle shape, it was there for at least 4-5 minutes i didnt have a camera with me and my cell phone camera was good enough to take the shot, everybody on the bridge seem to see it some slowed down and some stop, i couldnt belive this my girlfriend see it as well. the only thing i new it was a airplane or anything else ive seen before, im true beliver that were not alone. i didnt feel scared, but kinda nervous, and shock more then anything, i didnt see the object take off so i know it was still there after i drove off. i was driving downstate so i had to keep going, but it still puzzles me to this day, thank you for my opportunity to report my sighting, thank you (*deleted wit's name-sgonzalez\cms).
